function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of pathogen surveillance in the blood supply","Impact":"Increased risk of transmitting contagious diseases through blood transfusions","Mitigation":"Implementing novel surveillance systems and pathogen reduction technologies for the blood supply","Technologies":"Advanced surveillance systems and pathogen reduction technologies","People":"Patients receiving blood transfusions","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and blood banks"},{"Description":"Delayed access to healthcare for VBD patients","Impact":"Uninterrupted transmission cycle of viruses like dengue, leading to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare for early treatment of VBD","Technologies":"Telemedicine and outreach healthcare programs","People":"VBD patients and at-risk populations","Owner":"Healthcare providers and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Emerging VBD threats due to environmental/climate change, travel, and socio-economic factors","Impact":"Increased risk of VBD outbreaks from disease vectors and pathogen transmission","Mitigation":"Monitoring and mitigating environmental and socio-economic factors, as well as implementing surveillance and control measures for disease vectors","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technologies and vector control technologies","People":"General population in affected regions","Owner":"Government agencies and public health organizations"}]}
